channel.title: Sklearn on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Sklearn on Mark Needham

item.title: scikit-learn: Using GridSearch to tune the hyper-parameters of VotingClassifier
item.description: In my last blog post I showed how to create a multi class classification ensemble using scikit-learn's VotingClassifier and finished mentioning that I didn't know which classifiers should be part of the ensemble. We need to get a better score with each of the classifiers in the ensemble otherwise they can be excluded. We have a TF/IDF based classifier as well as well as the classifiers I wrote about in the last post.
